Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Provides for a limited alternative remedy to remove unauthorized persons from residential real property
Summary: Provides for a limited alternative remedy to remove unauthorized persons from residential real property if certain conditions are met.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to providing for a limited alternative remedy to remove unauthorized persons from residential real property
